channel.title: Hosting!?
channel.description: Ive port forwarded with my router and utorrent both saying the port is online. i know why i messed up with my router because i cant open my server with my mac so no problem. now for the utorrent i use 127.0.0.1 to log into my account but what would be the ip that the other players must use to log in? -my ip -my no-ip -ipv4 ????

item.title: Hosting!?
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

[quote=“statsflamescape, post:12, topic:368443”]I know the port is open but my ip is all messed up and crap so i need help with that, not help with the port

Success: I can see your service on 99.224.38.154 on port (43594)
Your ISP is not blocking port 43594[/quote]

Then try to change the client ip to ...**, hide ur ip please, now, DDoSer know that ur 43594 is open and they know ur ip too! anyway just try to connect to the server with it and tell me if its done. Ur IP can’t be messed up. only your no-ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting!?

item.description:
@statsflamescape wrote:

I know the port is open but my ip is all messed up and crap so i need help with that, not help with the port

Success: I can see your service on 99.224.38.154 on port (43594)
Your ISP is not blocking port 43594

item.title: Hosting!?
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

http://portforward.com/

run your server and check if ur port is open on this website. http://canyouseeme.org/

just run the server and type the port u opened. Then click check and it will check.

item.title: Hosting!?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“statsflamescape, post:4, topic:368443”]so people use the no-ip even though im using utorrent to port forward?
if so when u register a host what ip i use there?[/quote]

I’m not fully understanding you, when you register a no-ip you use YOUR IP.

item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Your IP/No-ip other players would use. Only you can use 127.0.0.1.
